characters: Driver of a black sedan, driver of a white sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road at night. The road is wet, and there are multiple vehicles ahead. The self-driving vehicle is following a blue car closely. The traffic lights are visible in the distance.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while following the blue car ahead. The vehicle is keeping a safe distance from the blue car, approximately 10 meters away. The road conditions are wet, and the vehicle is driving cautiously.
key_objects: 1) Front: A blue car, approximately 10 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Right: A white sedan, approximately 5 meters away, parked and partially blocking the view. 3) Left: A black sedan, approximately 3 meters away, moving slowly.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a wet road at night. A white sedan on the right side is moving forward and appears to be merging into the lane. The vehicle ahead is maintaining a steady speed. The road is illuminated by streetlights and building lights.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while monitoring the white sedan on the right side, which is attempting to merge into the lane. The vehicle ahead is maintaining a consistent speed, and the self-driving vehicle is keeping a safe distance.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A white sedan, approximately 2 meters away, moving forward and attempting to merge into the lane. 2) Front: A vehicle, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a steady speed.
